questions.question_text:
//IMG//
Refer to the exhibit. The EEM applet must generate a syslog message when a BGP adjacency flaps. This message must be displayed to the console of the switch. However, when a BGP adjacency failure is simulated, no syslog message is displayed. Which action resolves the issue?

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: D
I think D
the question doesn't seem to be correct

choices.B: Adjust the policy to match an SNMP OID
choices.A: Modify the policy to use the snmp-trap action
choices.C: Set the logging priority to Warnings

questions.question_text:
An engineer enables the packet postcards feature on a Cisco Nexus 9000 Series Switch but receives this error message:

“Error: Cannot configure postcard when inband-telemetry is configured.”

Which action resolves the issue?

choices.B: Reconfigure the Drive Type from “Removable” to “Non-Removable”.
choices.D: Configure the RAID that is associated with the card.
choices.A: Insert an SD card into SLOT-2.

questions.question_text:
//IMG//
Refer to the exhibit. During implementation of a Cisco UCS C-Series Server, an engineer receives the status that is shown in the exhibit. Which action resolves the issue?

discussion.content:
Correct Answer: D
For remove&delete the portgroup on VMM Domain you must migrate all VMs attached.
After migrate all VMs attached on the EPG-1 you can delete the portgroup on DVS

Selected Answer: D
Agree with D

questions.question_text: An engineer removes a VMM domain from an endpoint group called "EPG-1", but the distributed port group fails to be deleted. Which action resolves the issue?

choices.C: Remove the remaining EPGs from the VMM domain.
choices.B: Migrate all virtual machines in the EPG-1 to different hypervisors.
choices.D: Migrate all virtual machines in the EPG-1 to different port groups.

questions.question_text:
//IMG//
Refer to the exhibit. A network engineer is troubleshooting a Cisco Nexus 5000 Series Switch. The interface between the server and the switch is nonoperational and is expected to operate at 10 Gbps. The drain rate of the interface is 3 Mbps. Which action resolves the issue?

choices.B: Enable link level pause on the interface
